instruction: Create a list of qualities needed to be successful in the customer service industry.
output:
• Interpersonal skills 
• Adaptability 
• Patience 
• Empathy 
• Strong communication skills 
• Process-oriented 
• Time management skills
• Problem-solving skills
• Multitasking capabilities
• Ability to handle stressful situations 
• Conflict resolution skills
• Self-motivation 
• Technical aptitude
• Ability to multi-task
• Teamwork skills
• Positive attitude 
• Calm demeanor
• Active listening
